perturbation.original_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products the Company considers to be similar may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period at the Company's discretion. Amendments to this agreement are encouraged but not required.
perturbation.explanation: This change replaces the requirement for written amendments signed by all parties with a discretionary addition of 'similar products' by the company. This contradicts standard contract law principles, where amendments usually require mutual agreement. It also creates ambiguity around what 'similar products' means, potentially leading to disputes.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract Law, Amendment clauses in contract law

perturbation.original_text: C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: C. A donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter, potentially. Donated amounts may be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter at any time during the full term of the Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change replaces a mandatory donation schedule with a discretionary donation possibility. By using terms like 'potentially' and 'may be allocated,' the obligation to donate and the timeline are no longer fixed, contradicting the initial intent of a binding commitment.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract Law, Charitable Donation Laws, Promissory Estoppel

perturbation.original_text: ** The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company's Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text: ** The Company may, at its sole discretion, provide the NFLA-NC upon request any sales data the Company deems relevant.
perturbation.explanation: This change makes the provision of sales reports optional and at the company's discretion, negating the original transparency requirement. This contradicts principles of good faith and fair dealing, as it limits the NFLA-NC's ability to verify donation amounts.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract Law, Duty of Good Faith and Fair Dealing
